sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { motion } from 'framer-motion'; import { Camera, Mic, Brain, BarChart3, Users, Clock, CheckCircle, ArrowRight, Play, Upload, Eye, MessageSquare } from 'lucide-react'; const Home = () => { const features = [ { icon: , title: "Real-time Face Detection", description: "Advanced computer vision technology monitors eye contact and facial expressions during interviews." }, { icon: , title: "Speech Analysis", description: "AI-powered speech recognition analyzes clarity, tone, and detects filler words in real-time." }, { icon: , title: "Emotion Recognition", description: "Machine learning algorithms identify emotions and confidence levels from facial expressions." }, { icon: , title: "Performance Analytics", description: "Comprehensive scoring and detailed feedback on interview performance metrics." }, { icon: , title: "Personalized Questions", description: "AI generates customized interview questions based on your uploaded resume." }, { icon: , title: "Real-time Feedback", description: "Instant warnings and suggestions to improve your interview performance." } ]; const benefits = [ "Improve interview confidence and skills", "Get unbiased, objective feedback", "Practice with personalized questions", "Track your progress over time", "Save time and resources", "Prepare for real interviews effectively" ]; return (
{/* Hero Section */}
AI-Powered Interview Assessment System Practice interviews with AI that monitors your performance in real-time. Get personalized feedback to improve your interview skills. Start Interview View Results
{/* Features Section */}

Advanced AI Features

Our system uses cutting-edge artificial intelligence to provide comprehensive interview assessment and feedback.

{features.map((feature, index) => (
{feature.icon}

{feature.title}

{feature.description}

))}
{/* How It Works Section */}

How It Works

Simple steps to get started with your AI-powered interview practice

1

Upload Resume

Upload your resume to get personalized interview questions based on your experience and skills.

2

Start Interview

Begin your interview session with AI monitoring your face, voice, and responses in real-time.

3

Get Feedback

Receive comprehensive analysis and detailed feedback to improve your interview performance.

{/* Benefits Section */}

Why Choose Our AI Interview System?

    {benefits.map((benefit, index) => ( {benefit} ))}

Ready to Improve Your Interview Skills?

Join thousands of candidates who have improved their interview performance with our AI-powered system.

Get Started Now
{/* Team Section */}

Developed by Team Code Force

Graphic Era Hill University, Dehradun

{[ 'Bhumika Gupta', 'Vishwajeet Singh', 'Vandana Rautela', 'Sneha Thapliyal' ].map((member, index) => (
{member.split(' ').map(n => n[0]).join('')}

{member}

7th Semester B.Tech CSE

 ))}

Supervised by Dr. Seema Gulati

); }; export default Home;
